name: Dungeon Ruins
description:
Dungeon Ruins is an exciting game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a brave pioneer exploring mysterious dungeons full of treasures and dangers. You have to go through multi-story labyrinths filled with various enemies, riddles and treasures. Equipped with just a sword, boomerangs and potions, you will have to use all your skills and tactical thinking to successfully cope with the dangers that await you at every turn.

The game is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements. You need to clear the floors from enemies in order to go lower and lower.

Pass through a dangerous dungeon, face its guards and inhabitants, making your way to success. Are you ready to become a hero who will overcome all odds to find fame and fortune? Feel free to embark on this exciting adventure and test your luck!
